item.description:
Greetings Everyone!
I hope you can make it to our very special workshop this Monday July 2nd from 7-9PM at the South Church (Social Hall) 949 Main St (Rte 17) in South Glastonbury 06073.

We will learn & recite a mantra with the same Naad as the United States National Anthem (Happy Independence Day) which can round up the power of the sun, stars and planets to recalibrate your energetic orientation ... Be on the positive current!! This mantra, practice 11 times per day for 40 days has the power to remove negativity past & future, lifting generational (ancestral) curses.
Kundalini Yoga is the supreme technology for improving your energetic frequency.

Join us as we create powerful group energy field on the eve of the Thunder Moon, an auspicious opportunity for healing and upliftment with the celestial sound of the Gong and sacred mantras. All are welcome.
Yogi Tea and refreshments served after the program. Come and meet new friends!! Register: Jasdeep@me.com $20 advance ($25 at door)
www.kundaliniyogact.com
item.name: Kundalini Yoga Workshop & Gong Meditation "Thunder Moon"
